cause.description:
23 year old Jessie Foster disappeared from her North Las Vegas, Nevada on March 28th, 2006 at the age of 21. Her disappearance is considered a possible human trafficking case.
1. Help spread news of Jessie's disappearance, the world needs to know who she is!
2. Bring Jessie home
3. Spread awareness on human trafficking which is modern day slavery
cause.mission: Spread news about Jessie Foster's disappearance as well as awareness of human trafficking
cause.name: Help find Jessie Foster
